channel.title: admin on Yen-Chi Cheng
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Yen-Chi Cheng

item.description: I am a research assistant at National Tsing Hua University supervised by Prof. Min Sun. After taking CS61A and CS70 at U.C. Berkeley and Machine Learning by Prof. Hsuan-Tien Lin at NTU, I find my passion in Computer Science and decide to pursue PhD to consolidate my research career. Previously, I am lucky to work with Prof. Le Lu and Prof. Hwann-Tzong Chen. See my CV (last updated April 2019) for more details.
